name: Mannequin
description:
Mannequin is a short first person horror game where you navigate through a store filled with suspicious dolls as you step into the shoes of a clothing store worker.

However, as you make your way towards the exit, a flickering of lights precedes a complete power outage, plunging the store into darkness and leaving you trapped inside.


Try to survive while you make your way through the store and try to find a way out.


As you cautiously tread through the store's eerily quiet aisles you'll need to watch your back because each time you avert your gaze, they inch closer, their cold plastic hands reaching out to grasp you.

Features:

  • Using your phone as flashlight
  • Murderous dolls are chasing you
  • Chilling Atmosphere
  • A short thrilling experience
  • Nerve-wracking sounds
  • Surprise twist
  • Unexpected environment

Controls:

  • WASD to move
  • Mouse to Look
  • F to use flashlight
  • E to interact
  • Shift to sprint
  • ESC to Pause/UnPause
